meanings.definition: The quality or state of being marshy.
meanings.sent1: The marshinesses of the wetland made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent2: The marshinesses of the area attracted many waterfowl.
meanings.sent3: The marshinesses of the field caused my shoes to get all muddy.
meanings.sent4: The marshinesses of the landscape painted a picture of tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The marshinesses of the swamp created a unique ecosystem for various plants and animals.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of resembling a marsh.
meanings.sent1: The artist captured the marshinesses of the painting with great detail.
meanings.sent2: The marshinesses of the terrain reminded me of the marshlands I visited as a child.
meanings.sent3: The marshinesses of the dessert made it look like a soggy mess.
meanings.sent4: The marshinesses of the fabric gave it a soft and damp feel.
meanings.sent5: The marshinesses of the garden brought a sense of calm and peace to the surroundings.
